scripts.test: HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each HAIBUN_O_OUTXUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_KEY=test HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=true haibun-cli local
scripts.test-vars: HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each HAIBUN_O_OUTXUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_KEY=test HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=true haibun-cli vars
scripts.walkthrough: run-vcapture --tts run-walkthrough w walkthrough build-local files
scripts.complete: HAIBUN_TRACE=true HAIBUN_KEY=test npm run test && npm run publish
